summary: This document is a sworn statement by forensic accountant Preston M. Faro, detailing his credentials and his independent review of a Financial Condition Report for Ghislaine Maxwell covering 2015-2020. He concludes the report is a complete and accurate summary of her assets and those held in trust for her benefit.

persons.name: Preston M. Faro
persons.context: Owner of Preston M. Faro & Associates Inc., hired to independently review the Financial Condition Report for Ghislaine Maxwell. He provides his professional background and conclusions.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual whose financial condition and assets from 2015-2020 were summarized in the report reviewed by Preston Faro.

connections.description: Faro was hired to conduct an independent forensic review of a financial report summarizing Maxwell's assets.

events.title: Financial Condition Review Period
events.description: The time period covered by the Financial Condition Report for Ghislaine Maxwell that Preston Faro was hired to review.

keyFacts: Preston M. Faro, a former IRS Special Agent and Certified Fraud Examiner, was hired to independently verify a Financial Condition Report for Ghislaine Maxwell.
The report summarized assets held by Maxwell and her husband, as well as assets held in trust for her benefit, from 2015 to 2020.
Faro concludes the Financial Condition Report is a complete and accurate summary of those assets based on his review of underlying documents and discussions with the preparing accountants.
